DescriptionChanged.old_description: Add 'start <id>' and 'finish <id>' commands for kanban workflow. 'start' should create a branch and set issue status to in-progress. 'finish' should merge the branch and set status to done.
DescriptionChanged.new_description:
Add 'start <id>' and 'finish <id>' commands for kanban workflow.

'start' should create a branch and set issue status to in-progress.

'finish' should merge the branch and set status to done.
